Cyclone Komen August 2015 - During the 2: Cyclone Komen August 2015 - During the 2015 monsoon season, Cyclone Komen has occured in late July, bringing additional unusual torrential rains into Myanmar, Bangladesh and India. These rains has lead to a significant increase in monsoonal flood water, leading to severe flooding and landslides in Myanmar
Monsoonal Rains July 2016 - Heavy torren: Monsoonal Rains July 2016 - Heavy torrential monsoonal rains has started in June of 2016 and the continued heavy rainfall in July has lead to exacerbated flooding in Myanmar.
Monsoonal Rains August 2018 - Torrential: Monsoonal Rains August 2018 - Torrential monsoonal rains and abnormal rainfall pattern has caused the riverine flood in Sittaung River basin and Thanlwin river (Salween river) bansin from July to September 2018 and eventually caused the failure of Swar dam, in Yedashe Township, Bago region of Myanmar at the end of August.
